refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort a result from a dbx_query by a custom sort function

note.simpara: It is always better to use ORDER BY SQL clause instead of dbx_sort, if possible.

example.title: dbx_sort example
example.programlisting:
<?php
function user_re_order($a, $b) {
    $rv = dbx_compare($a, $b, "parentid", DBX_CMP_DESC);
    if (!$rv) {
        $rv = dbx_compare($a, $b, "id", DBX_CMP_NUMBER);
    }
    return $rv;
}

$link   = dbx_connect(DBX_ODBC, "", "db", "username", "password")
    or die("Could not connect");

$result = dbx_query($link, "SELECT id, parentid, description FROM tbl ORDER BY id");
    // data in $result is now ordered by id

dbx_sort($result, "user_re_order");
    // data in $result is now ordered by parentid (descending), then by id

dbx_close($link);
?>
